c.d:
By choosing this option, I won't be able to read your messages' content at all, so:
- the contents of your messages won't appear in logs
- the counts you add will be flagged as invalid
- your messages won't appear in the skullbboard.

If you just wish to be stealth in logs, then the best option is to select a partial opt-out instead, otherwise confirm the total opt-out.
